email.title: Chobots Account Registration
email.content:
Dear Parent,
Your e-mail address was used for creating a free account on Chobots. If you didn't register in our system, please disregard this e-mail. You will not receive any mails from us, unless you click the activation link below.
Chobots is a safe educational family game where kids can play, communicate with other kids and learn interesting facts about The Earth.
To let your child using Chobots with moderated chat, please click the activation link below: %3$s
For younger kids, there is an option to activate with limited, but safe picture-based chat: %4$s
If you are unable to click on the link above, copy and paste the URL to your browser.
Your child's Chobots account information is: Account: %1$s Password: %2$s
If you have any questions or willing to edit or delete this account, please contact our Support team at support@chobots.com.
Sincerely, The Chobots Team support@chobots.com Chobots! Your Family Game
************************************************************************************************* ** Please do not reply to this email, click on the url address above to activate your account ** *************************************************************************************************
